text: Up Periscope is a 1959 American World War II romantic drama movie. It was directed by Gordon Douglas. The movie is based on the book of the same name by Robb White. Actors include James Garner, Harry Landers, Edmond O'Brien, Warren Oates, Andra Martin, Alan Hale Jr., and Frank Gifford. It was distributed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 war movies Category:1959 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Gordon Douglas
title: Up Periscope
